TopicTitle: Starting a KSP cinematic series called "Beyond Borders"

Articles.Content: I always had a story in may head for my fake company so I thought I should make some story out of it. I intend Beyond Borders to have themes of exploration and war and jumping back and forth between them with episodes being from 15 to no longer than 20 minutes with a season being 6 episodes. I've got a basic idea of where the plot is going but right now I'm trying to see if this is something I would enjoy making.
